reg_info.act_under: Athletics Control Act   Loi sur le contrôle des sports

content.content: 1. The amount payable to the Minister under subsection 5 (1) of the Act is 2 per cent of the gross receipts of the contest or exhibition. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 51, s. 1.
content.raw_html: 1. The amount payable to the Minister under subsection 5 (1) of the Act is 2 per cent of the gross receipts of the contest or exhibition. R.R.O. 1990, Reg. 51, s. 1.
